channel.title: HUD post process is enabling itself back with every relaunch of the game
channel.description: I don't like to play with post process enabled in hud. So I decided to disable it. The problem is, that it enables itself back, every time when I close and launch the game again. Hope it's fixable.

item.title: HUD post process is enabling itself back with every relaunch of the game
item.dc:creator: ZenoPopo
item.description:
I don’t like to play with post process enabled in hud. So I decided to disable it. The problem is, that it enables itself back, every time when I close and launch the game again. Hope it’s fixable.

Read full topic
